net.kuujo.copycat.collections

Interface AsyncMap<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedMap

    public interface AsyncMap<K,V>
    Asynchronous map.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<Void> clear()
      Removes all entries from the map.

      • isEmpty

        CompletableFuture<Boolean> isEmpty()
        Checks whether the map is empty.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with a boolean value indicating whether the map is empty.

      • isEmpty

        CompletableFuture<Boolean> isEmpty(ConsistencyLevel consistency)
        Checks whether the map is empty.
        Parameters:
        consistency - The query consistency level.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with a boolean value indicating whether the map is empty.

      • size

        CompletableFuture<Integer> size()
        Gets the size of the map.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the number of entries in the map.

        Parameters:
        consistency - The query consistency level.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the number of entries in the map.
